definition: toiletry consisting of an aerosol foam used in hair styling, to apply a styling gel to
details:
noun
- toiletry consisting of an aerosol foam used in hair styling
= example: toiletry consisting of an aerosol foam used in hair styling
= synonyms: hair mousse, hair gel
- a light creamy dish made from fish or meat and set with gelatin
= example: a light creamy dish made from fish or meat and set with gelatin
- a rich, frothy, creamy dessert made with whipped egg whites and heavy cream
= example: a rich, frothy, creamy dessert made with whipped egg whites and heavy cream
verb
- to apply a styling gel to
= example: to apply a styling gel to
= synonyms: gel
